meanings.definition: A formal agreement between two or more states
meanings.sent1: The two countries signed treaties to ensure peace.
meanings.sent2: The treaties between nations help maintain diplomatic relations.
meanings.sent3: The treaty was so long, it took a whole day to read!
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was like a treaty, binding them together in trust.
meanings.sent5: The treaties were like promises written in stone, unbreakable and lasting.

meanings.definition: An agreement or arrangement made by negotiation
meanings.sent1: The trade treaties were crucial for economic growth.
meanings.sent2: Negotiating treaties requires compromise and understanding.
meanings.sent3: The treaty on sharing snacks was a hit at the party!
meanings.sent4: Their treaty to always help each other was a bond of loyalty.
meanings.sent5: The treaties they made were like maps guiding their future decisions.
